The VRECOV clist has been updated to the format that hsm changed
to a long time ago.

$README.text:
DISCLAIMER
----------

This code is supplied on an as-is basis.  No warranty is provided.  Use
at your own risk!  I will try to answer questions though.

                  Bill Horton
                  Tennessee Eastman Company
                  Building 284
                  Kingsport, TN 37662-1973

                  (615) 229-3388

INTRODUCTION
------------

This dialog may be used to recover a dataset which has been backed up
using IBM's DFHSM.  Syntax:

  %VRECOV {LEVEL(level) DSN(dsname) QUIET}

  where "level" is the dsname level to be recovered.  If LEVEL is
  specified, the dialog will generate a list of all datasets matching
  the specified level, from which the dataset to be recovered can be
  selected.

  "dsname" is the fully qualified name of a dataset to be recovered.  If
  DSN is specified, the dialog will generate a list of backup version of
  the datasets from which the desired version can be selected.

  QUIET turns off the "progress" messages normally displayed by the
  dialog.

If neither LEVEL nor DSN is specified, the dialog will prompt for a
dataset name/level.

The dialog may be invoked for a particular dataset by entering:

  %RECOV dsname

  where "dsname" is the same as above.

To invoke the dialog from ISPF 3.4, enter "%recov" on the line which has
the dataset you want to recover.

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS
-------------------------

1. Create a PDS from the IEBUPDTE source, if desired, using JCL similar
   to:

//IEBUPDTE JOB (91004,8),'name       ',CLASS=A,NOTIFY=userid
//        EXEC PGM=IEBUPDTE,PARM=NEW
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=$
//SYSUT2   DD  DSN=userid.VRECOV.CNTL,UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(5,3,45)),
//             DCB=(LRECL=80,RECFM=FB,BLKSIZE=23440),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG)
//SYSIN    DD  *
<- the downloaded PC file ->
/*

2. Copy the message member TECZ00 to your ISPF message library.

3. Copy the panel members VRECOV0-5 to your ISPF panel library.

4. Copy the CLISTs member RECOV and VRECOV to your TSO CLIST library.

5. If desired, create a menu panel entry and / or  ISPF command table
   entry to invoke the dialog.

VRECOV.text:
PROC 0 LEVEL(NONE) DSN(NONE) WAIT QUIET DEBUG

         /*-----------------------------------------------------------*/
         /* CLIST VRECOV                                              */
         /*                                                           */
         /* THIS CLIST IS DESIGNED TO BE INVOKED FROM ISPF OPTION 3.4 */
         /* TO RECOVER A DATASET VIA DFHSM.                           */
         /*                                                           */
         /*-----------------------------------------------------------*/

         IF &DEBUG = DEBUG THEN CONTROL LIST CONLIST SYMLIST MSG

         /* GENERATE DSNAME FOR OUTPUT OF HLIST */

         ISPEXEC VGET (ZSCREEN,ZPREFIX)
         SET ODS = SCREEN&ZSCREEN..DFHSM.LIST
INIT:    CONTROL NOMSG NOFLUSH
         DELETE &ODS

         /* INVOKE DFDSS HLIST COMMAND TO GET */
         /* LIST OF BACKED UP DATASETS        */

         IF &LEVEL ¬= NONE +
         THEN DO
           SET OPTS = LEVEL(&LEVEL)
           SET MODE = LEVEL
           END

         ELSE IF &DSN ¬= NONE +
         THEN DO
           SET OPTS = DSN('&DSN')
           SET MODE = DSN
           END

         ELSE DO

           ISPEXEC DISPLAY PANEL(VRECOV0)
           IF &LASTCC > 0 THEN EXIT

           IF &SYSINDEX(&STR(*),&VHSMDD) > 0 THEN DO   /* USE "LEVEL" */

             SET L = &LENGTH(&STR(&VHSMDD))

             IF &L = 1 THEN SET OPTS = LEVEL(&ZPREFIX)

             ELSE IF &SUBSTR(1:1,&VHSMDD) = &STR(') THEN SET OPTS = +
             &STR(LEVEL(&SUBSTR(2:&L-2,&VHSMDD))

             ELSE SET OPTS = LEVEL(&ZPREFIX..&SUBSTR(1:&L-1,&VHSMDD))

             SET MODE = LEVEL

             END                                       /* USE "LEVEL" */

           ELSE DO                                       /* USE "DSN" */

             SET OPTS = DSN(&VHSMDD)
             SET MODE = DSN

             END                                         /* USE "DSN" */

           END

         IF &QUIET ¬= QUIET THEN DO
           SET TECSMSG =
           SET TECLMSG = DFHSM HLIST COMMAND IN PROGRESS
           ISPEXEC CONTROL DISPLAY LOCK
           ISPEXEC DISPLAY MSG(TECZ000)
           END

         HLIST &OPTS ODS(&ODS) BCDS

         IF &QUIET ¬= QUIET THEN DO
           SET TECSMSG =
           SET TECLMSG = OUTPUT FROM HLIST COMMAND NOW BEING SCANNED
           ISPEXEC CONTROL DISPLAY LOCK
           ISPEXEC DISPLAY MSG(TECZ000)
           END

         /* CREATE MAIN ISPF TABLE TO HOLD LIST OF DATASETS */

         ISPEXEC TBCREATE VHSMBACK NOWRITE KEYS(VHSMDSN) +
         NAMES(VHSMNOV VHSMVER VHSMLAST VHSM1ST VHSMTABL VHSMDONE)
         SET VHSMDSN  =
         SET VHSMDONE =
         SET VHSMVER  = 0
         SET VHSMNOV  = 0
         SET VHSMLAST = &STR(00/00/00)
         SET VHSM1ST  = &STR(99/12/31)

         /* ALLOCATE AND OPEN DFHSM OUTPUT DATASET */

         ISPEXEC LMINIT DATAID(LMHSMLST) DATASET(&ODS)
         ISPEXEC LMOPEN DATAID(&LMHSMLST)

         /* READ FIRST RECORD */

         ISPEXEC LMGET  DATAID(&LMHSMLST) DATALOC(X) MODE(INVAR) +
           DATALEN(LX) MAXLEN(133)
         SET GCC = &LASTCC
         SET VHSMNO = 0
         SET READ_MORE = LOOKING

         /* READ UNTIL END OF BCDS SECTION ("----- END OF ") IS FOUND */

         DO WHILE (&GCC = 0 AND &READ_MORE ¬= NO)

           /* LOOK FOR BEGINNING OF BCDS SECTION */

           IF &SUBSTR(31:36,&X) = BACKUP +
           THEN SET READ_MORE = YES

           IF &READ_MORE = YES THEN DO

             IF &SUBSTR(2:9,&X) = &STR(ARC0138I) THEN  DO
                ISPEXEC LMCLOSE DATAID(&LMHSMLST)
                ISPEXEC LMFREE  DATAID(&LMHSMLST)
                SET TECSMSG = NOT BACKED UP
                SET TECLMSG = NO DATASET MATCHING SEARCH CRITERIA IS +
                              BACKED UP IN DFHSM
                ISPEXEC SETMSG MSG(TECZ001)
                ISPEXEC TBEND VHSMBACK
                EXIT
                END

             /* LOOK FOR NEW DATASET */

             IF &SUBSTR(2:10,&X) = &STR(DSNAME = ) THEN DO

               IF &VHSMNO > 0 THEN DO
                 ISPEXEC TBADD VHSMBACK
                 SET VHSMDSN  =
                 SET VHSMVER  = 0
                 SET VHSMNOV  = 0
                 SET VHSMLAST = &STR(00/00/00)
                 SET VHSM1ST  = &STR(99/12/31)
                 END

               SET VHSMNO = &VHSMNO + 1
               SET VHSMDSN = &SUBSTR(11:54,&X)
               SET VHSMTABL = VHSM&VHSMNO
               ISPEXEC TBCREATE &VHSMTABL KEYS(VHSMVER) +
               NAMES(VHSMDSN VHSMVOL VHSMDATE VHSMCAT VHSMGEN VHSMACT)
               END

             /* LOOK FOR DATASET DETAIL LINE */

             ELSE IF &SUBSTR(2:5,&X) ¬= &Z +
             AND &SUBSTR(4:11,&X) ¬= &STR(DFSMSHSM) +
             AND &SUBSTR(2:9,&X) ¬= &STR(BACKUP V) +
             AND &SUBSTR(2:9,&X) ¬= &STR(TOTAL BA) +
             AND &SUBSTR(2:6,&X) ¬= &STR(-----) +
             AND &READ_MORE = YES THEN DO

               /* SET SECONDARY TABLE VARIABLES */

               SET VHSMNOV = &VHSMNOV + 1

               SET VHSMVER = &SUBSTR(88:90,&X)

               SET VHSMVOL = &SUBSTR(54:59,&X)

               SET VHSMDATE = &STR(&SUBSTR(61:68,&X))

               IF &STR(&VHSMDATE) > &STR(&VHSMLAST) +
               THEN SET VHSMLAST = &STR(&VHSMDATE)

               IF &STR(&VHSMDATE) < &STR(&VHSM1ST) +
               THEN SET VHSM1ST  = &STR(&VHSMDATE)

               IF &SUBSTR(79:81,&X) = YES +
               THEN SET VHSMCAT = YES
               ELSE SET VHSMCAT = NO

               SET VHSMGEN = &SUBSTR(83:85,&X)

               SET VHSMACT =

               /* CREATE SECONDARY TABLE ENTRY */

               ISPEXEC TBADD &VHSMTABL

               END

             /* LOOK FOR END OF BCDS SECTION */

             ELSE IF &SUBSTR(2:14,&X) = &STR(----- END OF ) +
             AND &READ_MORE = YES THEN DO
               ISPEXEC TBADD VHSMBACK
               SET READ_MORE = NO
               END

             END

           /* READ NEXT RECORD */

           ISPEXEC LMGET  DATAID(&LMHSMLST) DATALOC(X) MODE(INVAR) +
           DATALEN(LX) MAXLEN(133)
           SET GCC = &LASTCC
           END

         /* ALL RECORDS READ AND TABLES BUILT */
         /* DISCARD DFHSM REPORT DATASET */

         ISPEXEC LMCLOSE DATAID(&LMHSMLST)
         ISPEXEC LMFREE  DATAID(&LMHSMLST)

         IF &VHSMNO = 0 THEN DO
           SET TECSMSG = NOT BACKED UP
           SET TECLMSG = NO DATASET MATCHING SEARCH CRITERIA IS +
                         BACKED UP IN DFHSM
           ISPEXEC SETMSG MSG(TECZ001)
           ISPEXEC TBEND VHSMBACK
           EXIT
           END

         /* DISPLAY MAIN TABLE */

         ISPEXEC TBTOP   VHSMBACK
         SET D1CC = 0
         IF &MODE = LEVEL +
         THEN DO
           ISPEXEC TBDISPL VHSMBACK PANEL(VRECOV1)
           SET D1CC = &LASTCC
           END

         /* CONTINUE DISPLAYING MAIN TABLE UNTIL END OR RETURN KEY */

         DO WHILE (&D1CC < 8)

           IF &ZTDSELS > 0 OR &MODE ¬= LEVEL THEN DO

             IF &HSEL = S +
             OR &MODE ¬= LEVEL THEN DO /* S LINE COMMAND - MAIN TABLE */

               IF &MODE = LEVEL +
               THEN ISPEXEC CONTROL DISPLAY SAVE

               /* DISPLAY SELECTED SECONDARY TABLE */

               ISPEXEC TBTOP &VHSMTABL
               ISPEXEC TBDISPL &VHSMTABL PANEL(VRECOV2)
               SET D2CC = &LASTCC

               /* SPECIFIC DATASET SELECTED FOR ACTION */

               IF &ZTDSELS > 0 THEN DO

                 IF &DSEL = S THEN DO     /* S LINE COMMAND - DS LIST */

                   SET TOVOL =
                   SET NDSN =
                   SET REP = NO

                   ISPEXEC DISPLAY PANEL(VRECOV3)

                   IF &LASTCC = 0 THEN DO

                     SET OPTS =
                     IF &REP = YES THEN SET OPTS = REPLACE

                     IF &VHSMCAT ¬= YES +
                     THEN SET OPTS = &STR(&OPTS FROMVOLUME(&VHSMVOL))

                     IF &NDSN ¬= &Z +
                     THEN SET OPTS = &STR(&OPTS NEWNAME(&NDSN))

                     IF &TOVOL ¬= &VHSMVOL AND &TOVOL ¬= &Z +
                     THEN DO

                       SET &TUNT = &STR(3390)

                       ISPEXEC DISPLAY PANEL(VRECOV3A)

                       SET OPTS = +
                       &STR(&OPTS TOVOLUME(&TOVOL) UNIT(&TUNT))

                     END

                     CONTROL MSG
                     SET D = &VHSMDSN
                     SET G = &VHSMGEN
                     SET SYSOUTTRAP = 1
                     HRECOVER '&D' GENERATION(&G) &OPTS

                     IF &LENGTH(&SYSOUTLINE1) >= 8 THEN DO
                       SET TECSMSG =
                       SET TECLMSG = &SYSOUTLINE1
                       IF &SUBSTR(1:8,&TECLMSG) = ARC1007I +
                       THEN ISPEXEC SETMSG MSG(TECZ000)
                       ELSE ISPEXEC SETMSG MSG(TECZ001)
                       END

                     IF &DEBUG ¬= DEBUG THEN CONTROL NOMSG
                     SET VHSMACT  = &STR(RECALL REQUESTED)
                     ISPEXEC TBMOD &VHSMTABL
                     SET VHSMDONE = &STR(*SEL)
                     ISPEXEC TBMOD VHSMBACK

                     END

                   END                    /* S LINE COMMAND - DS LIST */

                 ELSE IF &DSEL = D THEN DO/* D LINE COMMAND - DS LIST */

                   ISPEXEC DISPLAY PANEL(VRECOV4)

                   IF &LASTCC = 0 THEN DO

                     SET OPTS = VERSIONS(&VHSMVER)

                     IF &VHSMCAT ¬= YES +
                     THEN SET OPTS = &STR(&OPTS FROMVOLUME(&VHSMVOL))

                     CONTROL MSG
                     SET D = &VHSMDSN
                     SET SYSOUTTRAP = 1
                     HBDELETE '&D' &OPTS

                     IF &LENGTH(&SYSOUTLINE1) >= 8 THEN DO
                       SET TECSMSG =
                       SET TECLMSG = &SYSOUTLINE1
                       IF &SUBSTR(1:8,&TECLMSG) = ARC1007I +
                       THEN ISPEXEC SETMSG MSG(TECZ000)
                       ELSE ISPEXEC SETMSG MSG(TECZ001)
                       END

                     IF &DEBUG ¬= DEBUG THEN CONTROL NOMSG
                     SET VHSMACT  = &STR(DELETE REQUESTED)
                     ISPEXEC TBMOD &VHSMTABL
                     SET VHSMDONE = 1DEL
                     ISPEXEC TBMOD VHSMBACK

                     END

                   END                    /* D LINE COMMAND - DS LIST */

                 SET DSEL =

                 END

               IF &MODE = LEVEL +
               THEN ISPEXEC CONTROL DISPLAY RESTORE
               ELSE SET D1CC = 8

               END                     /* S LINE COMMAND - MAIN TABLE */

             ELSE IF &HSEL = D THEN DO /* D LINE COMMAND - MAIN TABLE */

               IF &MODE = LEVEL +
               THEN ISPEXEC CONTROL DISPLAY SAVE

               ISPEXEC DISPLAY PANEL(VRECOV5)

               IF &LASTCC = 0 THEN DO

                 CONTROL MSG
                 SET D = &VHSMDSN
                 SET SYSOUTTRAP = 1
                 HBDELETE '&D'

                 SET TECSMSG =
                 SET TECLMSG = &SYSOUTLINE1
                 IF &SUBSTR(1:8,&TECLMSG) = ARC1007I +
                 THEN ISPEXEC SETMSG MSG(TECZ000)
                 ELSE ISPEXEC SETMSG MSG(TECZ001)

                 IF &DEBUG ¬= DEBUG THEN CONTROL NOMSG
                 SET VHSMDONE = &STR(&DEL)
                 ISPEXEC TBMOD VHSMBACK

                 END

               IF &MODE = LEVEL +
               THEN ISPEXEC CONTROL DISPLAY RESTORE

               END                     /* D LINE COMMAND - MAIN TABLE */

             SET HSEL =

             END

           IF &D1CC = 4 THEN DO
             ISPEXEC TBDISPL VHSMBACK
             SET D1CC = &LASTCC
             END
           ELSE IF &D1CC < 8 THEN DO
             ISPEXEC TBDISPL VHSMBACK PANEL(VRECOV1)
             SET D1CC = &LASTCC
             END

           END

         /* GET TO TOP OF MAIN TABLE, SKIP THROUGH EACH ROW, CLOSING  */
         /* SECONDARY TABLES.                                         */

         ISPEXEC TBTOP VHSMBACK
         ISPEXEC TBSKIP VHSMBACK
         SET SCC = &LASTCC
         DO WHILE (&SCC = 0)
           ISPEXEC TBEND &VHSMTABL
           ISPEXEC TBSKIP VHSMBACK
           SET SCC = &LASTCC
           END

         /* CLOSE MAIN TABLE */

         ISPEXEC TBEND VHSMBACK

         IF &LEVEL = NONE AND &DSN = NONE THEN GOTO INIT

         EXIT

VRECOV0.text:
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
%-\-\  RECOVER BACKED UP DATASET  \-\-T
%Command ==>_ZCMD
+
 Enter complete or partial dataset name below.  DFHSM backup datasets will be
 displayed, from which you can select the source for recover.

   Dataset name%===>_VHSMDD                                        +

     Examples:       ISPF.PROFILE  --> &ZUSER..ISPF.PROFILE                    +
                     PROCS*        --> datasets beginning &ZPREFIX..PROCS      +
                     'PABC.DATA'   --> PABC.DATA                               +
                     *             --> all datasets beginning &ZPREFIX         +
)INIT
 VGET (VHSMDD) PROFILE
)PROC
 VER(&VHSMDD,NB)
 IF (.RESP = ENTER)
   VPUT (VHSMDD) PROFILE
)END

VRECOV1.text:
)ATTR
 @ TYPE(OUTPUT) INTENS(HIGH)
 ¬ TYPE(OUTPUT) INTENS(LOW)
)BODY
%------------------------  RECOVER BACKED UP DATASET  -------------------------T
%Command ==>_XCMD                                               %Scroll ==>_VHSS
+
 D to delete all backup copies of dataset
 S to select dataset for recover
%¦+
%¦                                                          Earliest  Latest
%V      Dataset Name                              Versions  Backup    Backup
)MODEL
_Z¬Z   ¬Z                                            ¬Z    ¬Z        ¬Z       +
)INIT
  &VARS = '(HSEL VHSMDONE VHSMDSN VHSMNOV VHSM1ST VHSMLAST)'
  &VHSS = CSR
  &HSEL = ' '
)END

VRECOV2.text:
)ATTR
 @ TYPE(OUTPUT) INTENS(HIGH)
 ¬ TYPE(OUTPUT) INTENS(LOW)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
%RECOVER &VHSMDSN \-\-T
%Command ==>_XCMD                                               %Scroll ==>_VHSS
+
%D+to%delete+the generation from backup
%S+to%select+the generation for recover
%¦+
%¦+
%V Date     Volume Generation  Version  Cataloged?  Action taken
)MODEL
_Z¬Z       ¬Z     +   ¬Z  +     ¬Z  +     ¬Z  +    ¬Z                          +
)INIT
  &VARS = '(DSEL VHSMDATE VHSMVOL VHSMGEN VHSMVER VHSMCAT VHSMACT)'
  &VHSS = CSR
  &DSEL = ' '
)END

VRECOV3.text:
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
%-\-\  RECOVER BACKED UP DATASET  \-\-T
%Command ==>_ZCMD
+
 Enter/verify recover parameters for &VHSMDSN                                  +
 which was backed up &D as generation &G:                                      +

   Target volume   %===>_TOVOL +(Original volume was &V)                       +

   New dataset name%===>_NDSN                                          +

   Replace existing dataset?%===>_REP+
)INIT
 &D = &VHSMDATE
 &G = &VHSMGEN
 &V = &VHSMVOL
)PROC
 VER(&TOVOL,NAME)
 VER(&NDSN,DSNAME)
 VER(&REP,LIST,YES,NO)
)END

VRECOV4.text:
)ATTR
 @ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) HILITE(REVERSE) COLOR(GREEN)
 ¬ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) HILITE(REVERSE) COLOR(YELLOW)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
%-\-\  DELETE BACKUP GENERATION  \-\-T
%Command ==>_ZCMD
+
 Backup generation of &VHSMDSN to be deleted:                                  +

   Generation     ===> &VHSMGEN+

   Version        ===> &VHSMVER+

   Date backed up ===> &VHSMDATE+

   Source volume  ===> &VHSMVOL+

 Press the¬Enter+key to delete the backup version
 Press the@End+key to keep the backup version
)PROC
 VER(&TOVOL,NAME)
 VER(&NDSN,DSNAME)
 VER(&REP,LIST,YES,NO)
)END

VRECOV5.text:
)ATTR
 @ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) HILITE(REVERSE) COLOR(GREEN)
 ¬ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) HILITE(REVERSE) COLOR(YELLOW)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
%-\-\  DELETE ALL BACKUP GENERATIONS  \-\-T
%Command ==>_ZCMD
+
   Dataset ===> &VHSMDSN                                    +

 Press the¬Enter+key to delete%all+backup generations
 Press the@End+key to keep the backup generations
)END
